item.description:
A few months back we had a fine event at MeadHall and I promised to do it again. Well, it's time to head back and enjoy some good beer in the spirit of the holidays.

There are two levels to MeadHall.Â  On first level is the main tap room and bar. The second level has a nice lounge area and another bar. We'll meet at the second level lounge since it will give us more room and a nice area to socialize.

MeadHall is one of the best Beer Bars in Boston. It has over 100 quality beers on tap. It's located in Kendal Square not far from the Red Line T stop. (around the corner from the Marriott Hotel)

Here's the link: http://themeadhall.com/

Don't worry the site is still under construction but at least it provides the address and phone number.

Looking forward to seeing everyone - Happy Holidays
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lounge area on the second level.
item.name: Deck the Halls ...at MeadHall
